title: Zuma Resources okays expansion into AI, EV projects and global E-SIM partnership
description: Board clears FY25 accounts, court-mandated divestment, AGM on Dec 31, and deal for 20% share in global E-SIM revenueThe post Zuma Resources okays expansion into AI, EV projects and global E-SIM partnership appeared first on Profit by Pakistan Today.

title: AI Godfather Geoffrey Hinton Warns Students: Don’t Give Up Your Computer Science Degree Yet
description: According to Hinton, the real value of a CS degree lies in the fundamentals -- systems thinking, mathematics, logic, and problem-solving. These are the skills that shape how technology works at its core.

title: Analysts See Continued Upside in TSMC (TSM) Amid AI Demand
description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company Limited (NYSE:TSM) is among the best stocks you’ll wish you bought sooner. As of December 2, the semiconductor foundry giant TSMC is a consensus Buy with almost all the analysts covering it assigning a Buy or equivalent rating. It is not only the positive sentiment; analysts also expect the stock to rise [...]
